title: I got SCAMMED on Kickstarter...
description: Thanks to Bespoke Post for sponsoring this video. Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at  and use promo code EVANS20 at checkout! I got scammed by Instagram ads:  The Steam Deck is PERFECT:   Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   My new F1 show  @TheBackmarkers:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
